text:
[Verse]
Sun is rising up high
In a blue sky wide
Feel the breeze on my skin
Wanna run wanna fly

[Verse 2]
Got a smile on my face
In this warm embrace
Every moment feels right
Can't forget this place

[Chorus]
Days like this I know
Everything will glow
Hold onto this bliss
Never let it go

[Verse 3]
Dancing under the sun
Till the day is done
With the beat in my heart
We can keep on the run

[Verse 4]
Friends are by my side
On this joyful ride
Laughing singing all day
In this endless tide

[Chorus]
Days like this I know
Everything will glow
Hold onto this bliss
Never let it go
title: Days Like This
